collection:
## We do...

We do log a small amount of information about the requests made to the
service.

This information includes the date and time of requests, the IP the
request came from, and it's location.

We also store details about system errors so they can be investigated and
rectified.
Any information collected by our hosting platform is outside our control.
sharing:
## We do not...

We do not share the information we do log with 3rd parties.
